User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Tiranga game.

emailId.description: Unique email-like ID for the user (e.g., user123@tiranga.in).

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

GameRound.title: GameRound
GameRound.description: Represents a single round of a game.

id.description: Unique identifier for the game round.

startTime.description: Timestamp of when the game round started.

resultNumber.description: The winning number for the round (0-9).

resultColor.description: The winning color for the round (green, orange, white).

status.description: Status of the game round (betting, locked, finished).

Bet.title: Bet
Bet.description: Represents a user's bet on a game round.

choice.description: The user's bet choice (e.g., color:green, number:5, big).

multiplier.description: The multiplier applied to the bet.

won.description: Indicates whether the user won the bet.

payout.description: The payout amount if the user won.

id.description: Unique identifier for the deposit request.

amount.description: The amount the user wants to deposit.

status.description: Status of the deposit request (pending, approved, rejected).

requestedAt.description: Timestamp of when the deposit was requested.

id.description: Unique identifier for the withdrawal request.

amount.description: The amount the user wants to withdraw.

upiBank.description: UPI or Bank Details for withdrawal.

status.description: Status of the withdrawal request (pending, approved, rejected).

requestedAt.description: Timestamp of when the withdrawal was requested.

uid.description: The Firebase UID of the user with admin role.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Path-based ownership ensures data privacy.

/game_rounds/{gameId}.description: Publicly accessible information about each game round.

/deposits/{depositId}.description: Centralized collection for all user deposit requests. Admins have access, users can only create.

/withdrawals/{withdrawalId}.description: Centralized collection for all user withdrawal requests. Admins have access, users can only create.

/users/{userId}/bets/{betId}.description: Stores bets placed by users. Path-based ownership restricts access.

/roles_admin/{adminId}.description: Maps user UIDs to admin roles. Existence of a document grants admin privileges.
